RainbruRPG::Options::OptionBoolAttribute

RainbruRPG::Options::OptionBoolAttribute Class Reference

#include <optionboolattribute.h>

Inheritance diagram for RainbruRPG::Options::OptionBoolAttribute:

[legend]
Collaboration diagram for RainbruRPG::Options::OptionBoolAttribute:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

An option attribute storing a boolean value.

A boolean attribute is shown as a checkbox in the FOX LauncherOption dialog

See also:
OptionManager, OptionAttribute

Definition at line 46 of file optionboolattribute.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

RainbruRPG::Options::OptionBoolAttribute::OptionBoolAttribute ( const char *  n  ) 

The named constructor.

It sets the type of the attribuet at OAT_BOOLEAN, call setName() and sets value to true.

See also:
OptionAttribute, setName(), value
Parameters:
n The setName() param.

Definition at line 35 of file optionboolattribute.cpp.

Member Function Documentation

bool RainbruRPG::Options::OptionBoolAttribute::setValueStr ( const char *  c  )  [virtual]

Set the value of the attribute.

It internally use StringConv::ctob() to convert a string to a boolean. It waits a string like 'true' or 'false', not a number (ie. 0/1).

See also:
StringConv, getValueStr(), value
Returns:
Always true

Implements RainbruRPG::Options::OptionAttribute.

Definition at line 53 of file optionboolattribute.cpp.

const char * RainbruRPG::Options::OptionBoolAttribute::getValueStr (  )  const [virtual]

Get the value of the attribute.

It internally use StringConv::btoc() to convert a boolean to a string. It returns a string like 'true' or 'false', not a number (ie. 0/1).

See also:
StringConv, setValueStr(), value
Returns:
Always true

Implements RainbruRPG::Options::OptionAttribute.

Definition at line 68 of file optionboolattribute.cpp.

void RainbruRPG::Options::OptionAttribute::setType ( tOptionAttributeType  t  )  [inherited]

Set the type of the attribute.

Set OptionAttribute::type to t. If the type is OAT_UNKNOWN, a warning log message is sent to the Logger.

See also:
getType(), type.
Parameters:
t The new type of the attribute

Definition at line 47 of file optionattribute.cpp.

void RainbruRPG::Options::OptionAttribute::setName ( const char *  n  )  [inherited]

Set the name of the attribute.

Logs a warning message if the name is empty. The control of the lenght of the string is done by std::strlen.

See also:
getName(), name
Parameters:
n The new name of the attribute

const char * RainbruRPG::Options::OptionAttribute::getToolTip (  )  [inherited]

Get the tooltip text of the attribute.

The name can contains space and other specials character but keep in mind this is used as the label of the option (in LauncherOptions dialog).

See also:
setToolTip(), tooltip
